header.prompt: A very short title less than 10 words describing the topic of the context. The short title does not need to be a full sentence but rather full of informative words.

body.prompt: A short description less than 50 words explaining the whole idea of the context. The short description should highlight keywords and concepts mentioned in the context.

Read the whole context and divide the whole knowledge explained in the context into 5 chapters separated by 
 and find a name less than 20 words for each chapter. Separate each chapter name by 
. Only write chapter names with 
.

You are writing a short description less than 50 words about the chapter '%chapter-name%'. First, find information related to the chapter and focus only on those. Second, find keywords and important information mentioned in the focused information about the chapter '%chapter-name%'. And finally, write a short description less than 50 words with all those keywords.
